short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes 'election was rigged' to 'election was RIGATONI'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Living in a 24-hour news cycle is stressful enough, but the amount of disinformation spread around the internet makes one want to shut down their computer and run off into the woods. This extension will make using the internet a little more tolerable by taking one repeated line from The Big Lie by turning it into a complaint about one of the world's most beloved pasta shapes.
